synopsis.text: Guest Starring at Moriko's: An Unaired Adventure! In this special 11th episode, Moriko Morioka faces a tech crisis when her computer bites the dust. Luckily, she knows just the right person to call - Yuuta Sakurai, a computer whiz! But when Sakurai offers to come over and assemble a new PC for her, Moriko finds herself in an unexpected predicament. Will she conquer her nerves and successfully host her first guest? In the second half of the episode, Moriko's real-life friends join her in a dream sequence set in the world of Fruits de Mer, their favorite MMO. Don't miss out on this thrilling and hilarious escapade!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
